website_summaries.verdict: A bit pricey, but worth considering if you all you need is an easy-to-use spot treatment that won't leave a strong lingering scent.
pros: Multipurpose molecular odor-eliminating action goes to the source, working for everything from furniture and clothes to garbage cans and pet odors
May be sprayed directly onto surfaces or turned to mist setting for airborne odors
cons: Needs to be reapplied for stronger odors
Slight tracer scent is detectable immediately after use

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kitchen. Also great for erasing lunch smell, trash smell, plant soil smell.
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my office/studio, around the trash bins, and in the poorly ventilated kitchen. The effect is great. It basically erases the smell of plant soil, reuben sandwich, roasted garlic, lamb stew, stir-fry, pan-seared salmon, canned sardine in oil, etc. Some other reviews complained about the residual chemical smell, and I detect that smell, but I don't mind it. This also works well when I take the trash out. Works better than Febreze odor eliminator without any strong scent, which they long discontinued, and none of their current lines is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryuji Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: As someone who's tried everything—and I mean everything—to reduce or eliminate smells, this is the only thing I've found that really works. From a slightly musty smell in the house that's impossible to get rid of, to a car that smells like smoke, I sprayed both a few times and in both cases the odors are completely gone. This stuff is nothing short of amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Copyboy

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!!!! Do Not Buy This Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Zero Stars!!! Only put the four stars so review would get posted...**Do Not Buy!!!!**** Totally got screwed on amount of product!!!!!!! Only got 8oz in 16oz bottle!!! For $15.99!!! So Pissed!!! Posted video and picture....Will be reporting to Amazon also.....
customer_reviews.author: William Waldron

customer_reviews.title: No More Allergic Reactions!!
customer_reviews.text: As some have said, the chlorine scent dissipates soon after spraying. Someone in my office is allergic even to natural air fresheners I've bought. Since we started using this, I haven't heard a peep out of the person with the allergies. This doesn't give the impression that it works because it doesn't smell like anything...however, the air in the office seems cleaner to me. I don't like spending more money, but it's worth it to go fragrance-free just to keep the office mood stable!!
customer_reviews.author: SumoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked wonders for us! We were selling our house and needed to get rid of the dog smell in our house. Having a tiny house and two big dogs, it was pretty strong. We just sprayed in the air, and the furniture and carpets and it worked amazingly in just 24 hours! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: PHEW!  Horrible smell develops over time
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this after reading mixed reviews. When it arrived, I sniffed it. A very mild, slightly bleachy smell. A few weeks later, an outdoor tomcat sprayed my screen door. A friend sprayed it with this stuff. What a horrible reek! Phew! It reminded me of insecticide. And it wouldn't go away. Every time my porch gets wet it stinks all over again. It gets on the bottoms of my boots, and stinks when I come into the house. My experience may explain the mixed reviews about the smell. It seems to develop over time. The longer it sits in the bottle, the worse it stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wether

customer_reviews.title: The reviews were right, this isn't a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping (and expecting) the bad reviews about this product to be wrong or biased. But most of the complaints were justified, based on the one bottle of this that I purchased. Yes, it leaves a smell of bleach. Not as strong as real bleach, but it's there and unmistakable and it lingers. It doesn't remove smells any better than anything else, either and at sixteen bucks a pop I'm not going to spray double or treble the amount just to get better results. Very disappointing and not remotely worth the money, a 99c air freshener did the job better. If I got a lemon, it was still an expensive one and I'm not inclined to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Osborne

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work on odors
customer_reviews.text: This was highly recommended to me to get rid of smokey odors caused by a fire pit on a piece of wood furniture that was stored in an out building next to the fire pit. It simply does not work at all. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is total garage! I purchased a small storage ottoman, that was made in China (never again). For some reason some of the materials they use carry a weird smell. It was nothing to bad, so I thought that this spray would solve the issue. It made the smell worse! I could have done better using plain water, which this product appears to be little more than. Save your time, money and effort!
customer_reviews.author: T.Shop

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of an overabundance of fragrance someone had sprayed ...
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of an overabundance of fragrance someone had sprayed on some curtains. This was the only thing that worked to remove the odor. However, it did take about four applications.
customer_reviews.author: sara davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a vehicle that smelled like marijuana. It was obvious that someone smoked a LOT in it, but the price was right and we needed a vehicle. We aired it out, cleaned it, tried to put charcoal pouches in it. Nothing worked, we didnt think we would be able to get the smell out. My mom recommended this spray, so desperate, we tried it. WOW!!!! It got the smell out!!! My husband sprayed the entire vehicle. Headliner, leather seats, dash, floors, rugs, trunk, compartments, sprayed it in the cabin vent. I cant recommend this product enough, I will be telling everyone about it. LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Smells ok!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to say this delicately, but due to an illness in the family, we have a bathroom odor situation. We had been using Febreeze, but it had gotten to the point where the smell of Febreeze mixed with the bathroom odors was nauseating. I bought a number of odor eliminators, and we have decided this one is our favorite. It absolutely eliminates the odor. It leaves a slight chlorine scent after you use it. This seems OK, because it just smells like you just cleaned the bathroom. I will be buying more of this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Smells faintly of chlorine. (Frankly, the smell can ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells faintly of chlorine. (Frankly, the smell can be mistaken as that of seminal fluid). But it does its job in eliminating odors. I use it on my old couch (on which having THAT smell can be embarrassing) so I usually spray it on a few days before my guests would arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pack a day smoker (don't judge!) and couldn't stand the smell of my 700 sq ft home when I opened the door. I've bought expensive air purifiers, which barely made a difference. I can't use scented sprays because perfume/fragrances give me migraines. I was very skeptical about this product, but ended up loving it so much that I ordered two more bottles and told my mom about it. She ordered and tried, and loves it too. Now I come home, walk through the door, and nothing... I smell nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This product does eliminate odors I know it says the slight bleach scent disappears, but I am very sensitive to odors and I can smell a faint lingering bleach smell on fabric. It does eliminate the unwanted odors which is definitely a plus. Since it is so very slight and bleach odor is not one of my triggers, I really appreciate the product
customer_reviews.author: M-M

customer_reviews.title: Make Your Home Smell... Like a Hospital
customer_reviews.text: If you love bleach and other hospital aromas, hit the buy now button right away. That's what this product does and to me it's not quite what the doctor ordered. (*rimshot*) This product does seem to work, although not as well as I'd hope even with the bleach aroma. You spray it on, the bleach scent replaces whatever offending scent, and then after a while the bleach fades and you're more or less back at square one. Sometimes a repeat application does seem to work. All in all, I'd probably not buy this again. I find the bleach aroma to be almost as bad as most of the smells I'm trying to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Adam MachanicTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to eliminate some lingering odors in a used car that I bought recently. I regret to say that the odors are still there, and I used most of the bottle. I'm contemplating requesting a refund from Amazon, but just haven't had the time to do it. If you decide to buy it, I hope it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: John Yuma

customer_reviews.title: No scent just like the product advertises.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time yesterday and so far it is true to form I did not want a scented product to mask the smoke odor I was trying to get rid of. I believe it will take more than one application to fully reach my goal but so far it appears to help. In a few days I will be able to tell if the original odor returns or I'm rid of it for good. The negatives of this product are the trigger is too flimsy (cheaply made) and it arrived with about 1/3 of the product leaked out already. I did not return it because I was eager to evaluate the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D Luvisi

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used every product there is to try and remove pet odor. Nothing has really worked. Most cover the smell of urine with strong scents like orange or lavender, but the urine smell still lurks underneath. I've had to toss several items of furniture and rugs because of this. This stuff, however, works amazingly well. I've used it on our foam mattress that our toilet training toddler peed on and the smell is gone. It has also completely eliminated old odors from our dog marking on the rugs. This product is fantastic and has saved my sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to counteract sickroom/bedpan odors. Sprayed it in the air liberally and didn't find that it helped AT ALL. And I could detect a slight odor from the product itself, which was not a fresh or pleasant smell itself. Sorry I spent money on this - it may work for some odors, but not potty smells from a very sick patient.
customer_reviews.author: Anne88

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, a skunk was looking for the Skunk Cafe under my house. When he didn't find it, he got angry and sprayed. This rotten odor then penetrated my house. I read the reviews, and thought this odor eliminator would be my savior, especially since it was rather expensive. To my dismay, it didn't work. I used the whole container in my house, which is only about 1000 sq ft, and for a few minutes, some of the odor was gone, but in about 1 hour it was all just as bad as when I started. I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rawhide

customer_reviews.title: Best at getting rid of smells
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Seriously! I don't usually leave reviews but this really does what it's supposed to. I have a small dog that enjoys going pee and poop in my hallway. I've tried different products before that claim to get rid of the smell... This one so far has been the only one to do that. I've tried nature's miracle before and STILL could smell urine. This I sprayed down the area and could only smell a very light smell of bleach. It never changed the color of the carpet. I still have to spray the area daily because of my dog, but as long as I have a bottle I really don't care!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Krieser

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Golden with a sensitive stomach, so she throws up a bit. So much fun. Anyhow, our area rugs smell from repeat events of this, and all my cleaning and products in the world stopped working. I used the entire bottle on key areas 12 hours apart. Hooray! No more bad odors! There is a definite odor when this product is first sprayed—industrial clean kind of smell, like Chlorox. However, it dissipated quickly, maybe a few hours with windows closed. Well worth it to get rid of bad odors.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked my on 29 year old vintage bag
customer_reviews.text: The squirt nozzle came broken in the mail but I still make it work. I purchased a 29 year old Louis Vuitton bag and it reeked of perfume. I let it air out a bit and then dabbed this all over the interior of the canvas let it dry then did it again. I then put some odor eliminating charcoal pouches in the bag and didn’t touch it for 3 days. This significantly reduced the smell of the perfume. I will say product has an almost bleach like smell to it but it does dissipate. I don’t think I could have reduced the smell of my bag with out this.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Guitar Case Mildew Killer!!! It Works!!!  No more reeking cases.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a guitar case that soon after, started reeking of mildew, Not the cool, old smell familiar with vintage instruments, but the really bad, been in a flood,/sewer event smell. I tried baking soda, leaving it in the sun, ammonia water, alcohol, Acetone, ... NOTHING would get rid of that horrible diaper, sewer smell. Normally these would end up in the garbage but after watching the video, I HAD to give "0 Odor" a try. (Seeing that ladystick her face in a diaper pail , did it for me!) One application killed the smell. no odor whatsoever. A product that does exactly what it says. Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: Magnus P Baracho

customer_reviews.title: Gets out smoke.
customer_reviews.text: This got a faint smoke smell right out of my used vehicle... I was super disappointed thinking I had bought a non smoking vehicle- but - this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: Overall Outstanding for odor elimination, better than the many others I have tried over the years. purchased this one by request of family members as Trhe 1st one was thru a local market..There is no thickness to this and no scent of its own like others that spray...Will purchase again now that i found it here..
customer_reviews.author: artrick

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this before several years ago and really liked it. I saw it on Amazon and ordered it. We use it frequently in the kitchen after cooking fish or other smelly dishes when you don’t want a strong scent just covering up the odor. We recorded it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry B.

customer_reviews.title: Actually eliminates odors!!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works! Definitely buying more! I have a dog and she had an accident while I was away( #2). I sprayed the zero Odor in the air. The odor was gone instantly. I have the unscented. It has a slight, light odor. Nothing strong so at least when I spray I can tell. I tried febreze and natural odor eliminators that just cover up the scent or does not get ride of it entirely. At little pricey compared to other sprays, but worth it. The zero odor will definitely be a Regular brand I buy going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Watts

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Like the product ... works well. However when I received it it was soaked and the box crumpled. Bottle not full. I did reach out to the maker and they are sending me a new bottle. I like that there is no overpowering smell but yet it does seem to work to eliminate odors.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product, I'm a return customer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a sample size from another store and loved how well it removed all odors I've tried it on. It does leave a very mild "tracer" sent so you can tell where you've already sprayed but the scent goes away in just a couple of minutes. It leaves no trace of itself at all. We have dogs and a big family so I'm really putting it to the test and so far...so good!
customer_reviews.author: V.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: burnt food smell GONE!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried vinegar and water, Oxium with limited results. I sprayed this air sanitizer and it worked well almost instantly! It worked much better that anything else I had tried and used it a couple days apart and now cannot smell any remnant of burnt sugar that I caused. The only issue was a slight white residue that it left upon drying. It was easily cleared with a damp cloth. It had a pleasant smell and did not require a lot of product to take care of my problem
customer_reviews.author: Nuala

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a swimming pool
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on two things- a musty shirt and an area where there was a rat's nest The rat's nest smelled like a dirty swimming pool and the shirt smelled like a hotel swimming pool. I guess the smell is improved, but this product is advertised as an odor eliminator. It didn't really do that. I'm so disappointed because it's hard to find a fragrance free odor eliminator.
customer_reviews.author: HotHamWater

customer_reviews.title: Clean odor, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I live in a first-floor apartment in a 4-apartment building and feel an obligation to my co-tenants to keep our common entry space free of my cooking odors. Not to mention the fact that I like my personal space clear of smells as well. Zero Order accomplishes both without adding another scent, which so often means something heavily floral. I've used it for years--in the past, to control cat litter-box odors--and have always been pleased. It is increasingly difficult to find, so I was happy to locate in on Amazon. I don't need to use it every day and it only takes a few squirts, so for me a container lasts a long while (at least a year).
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective and Safe
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and was glad to be able to have it shipped to me after giving the last I had to someone in need! It eliminates odors very well and with essentially no residual scent.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I was ready for the slight bleach smell, but as other reviewers pointed out, the scent dissipates pretty quickly and it works well for odor elimination. I bought this for dog beds and carpeting, because the wet dog smell can really linger. Let it dry before allowing children or pets onto treated area, just to be safe. I love the results! It really works well, I love that my bedroom and crate no longer smells like sweet dog!
customer_reviews.author: ilyandra

customer_reviews.title: Best odor eliminator ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many brands and many different types of odor elminators. This one receives 100% satisfaction from me. You only need a few sprays and all different odors are elminated. i now buy only this. the last Amazon shipment was a broken cap/bottle which could not be used and I asked for a replacement. This was accomplished quickly and I am now waiting for the replacement shipment. very excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the Hype !
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work at all to eliminate odors. I sprayed this on a very smelly garbage can, and it had no effect. For the price I expected this to work better!. Don't waste your money! I am just going to use dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product that actually gets rid of bad smells in a dank basement. It doesn't really have a scent which makes this even better. It isn't another smell on top of a bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dar N.

customer_reviews.title: This product is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the first time I’ve purchased this are usually buy it in gallons. I think I’ve already purchased 6 gallons since I started using this product. I am a mobile dog grooming van and it’s a game changer. I just wish you had it in a concentrate so you could mix it with water. Because I go through it. I bought this one to get rid of the musty odor in my friends cabin. I know it’s going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: great for hyperosmia
customer_reviews.text: This has helped immensely with my smell sensitivity and migraines. Works on pungent foods, pet waste smells, even strong perfumes or scented air fresheners. It does have a slight cleanser scent that disappates about 5-10 minutes after spraying. When using, I recommend aiming almost at the ceiling to let it cover all the space beneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Matson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. After reading all of the positive reviews I expected this to work well. All it gives off is a faint bleach odor and does not get rid of stagnant air smell.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Evans

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It smells like bleech and a hospital..it doesn't work. I sprayed it a musty suit case and with in a hour the smell was back. I would rather use freeze!
customer_reviews.author: bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Just as Good as What Odor
customer_reviews.text: I used What Odor? When it first came out on cat pee in my car. It worked great. I recently moved into a room that had old cat urine smell. I cleaned the area and the smell was still there. I went to go buy What Odor? But it was $3 more then Zero Odor. So I thought I would try Zero Odor. I sprayed it yesterday and woke up this morning to Zero Odor! I can highly recommend Zero Odor!
customer_reviews.author: PrimePhenomenon

customer_reviews.title: Scentless ??
customer_reviews.text: It does kill the offensive odor you are trying to get rid of, and it seems to be based on organic chemical processes I've read about elsewhere [hence the "O" logo]. But, although it claims to leave no scent, I find it does leave a chlorine-like after-smell that takes a day to dissipate when the house is closed up for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Electronics Eng. from MA

customer_reviews.title: A Perfectly Scentless Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Not a scent fan of any fabric refresher. This has absolutely NO scent! It’s pretty much perfect! I use it in the wash too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisfn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product which I would recommend to anyone. However, I'm confused about your asking about the product's odor when it clearly tells you that it doesn't have any.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT work AT ALL. I bought it to take the musky smell out of craft moss. I spread the moss on a a cookie sheet and sprayed the top, flipped and sprayed the bottom and repeated this for SIX DAYS IN A ROW. It did not remove the smell on iota! Do not waste your money. I was so hopeful that it would work and completely disappointed that it did not....at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has never peed in the house before, but now she is older and had an accident. I tried everything to get the smell out and this was my last resort. If this didn't work I was getting rid of the couch! I ordered it and two days later it arrived. I was super worried but I sprayed it on with high hopes. It had a slight bleach smell, but it smelled clean so it was ok with me! A few hours later I checked it. It was dry and there was no smell or pee or bleach. The smell is completely gone!! Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karter Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After My dogs visited with a skunk, and then ran through the house, the “perfume” was horrible. The “boys” had a bath in a skunk removal recipe They smelled much better but the odor lingered in the house. This product cleared it out after a couple of trips through. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan V

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stuff, too bad it’s so expensive. I’m using it sparingly on the most offensive odors and it delivers!
customer_reviews.author: Larry G Wood

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Leaves a Scent Though.
customer_reviews.text: I love how great this product works! It got this really bad, deep odor out of my car seat & carpets. It did, however, leave a strange chlorine/bleach like scent in my car for a couple of days. Other than that, this product works AMAZING and I highly recommend it to everyone who is looking into it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Scheffler

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: They must have changed {cheapened} the formula. Did absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: guitarfixation

customer_reviews.title: Really works to get rid of garbage odor
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular problem with a kitchen garbage pail. Nothing worked--Febreze, scented sprays, clorox spray, cleaning the pail with clorox. Smells happened as soon as any food was in the pail which had odors. I decided to try this and it has completely dealt with the problem. As soon as I have something in the pail with odor, I spray it and if necessary, reapply until I throw out the garbage. It has almost no odor itself, mild citrus after smell which goes away right away. And it has lasted me since the beginning of January. I will be reordering soon.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: No Odor...No scent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff I've ever tried. It has gotten the smell of cat urine out of an antique oriental rug, it has gotten the smell of stale fireplace and smoke out of an old cabin...it is nothing short of miraculous and NO masking scent just a true removal of all things foul.
customer_reviews.author: SarahoftheAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of the odor, but has an odor itself
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job getting rid of cat litter odors, but it does have its own odor that is not super unpleasant, but also not great. That said, it's the best thing I have found to keep cat box odors under control, and it doesn't keep the cat from using the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schiff

customer_reviews.title: Zero Odor
customer_reviews.text: It don't mask odor; it gets rid of it. I have an extra large dog & this gets rid of odor on the foam insert of her bed. I wash the cover but the foam is hard to clean properly. I don't like to scrub it or put it in the washer; I worry that frequent cleaning will destroy it. (It takes a long time to dry so I also worry about mold & mildew.) The spray has had no adverse reactions with her skin, or anyone's breathing like Sanitizing sprays do.
customer_reviews.author: cg77

customer_reviews.title: Okay but try something else
customer_reviews.text: It simply masks the odor and does not get rid of the odor. Not sure what all the reviews were about with this stuff getting rid of odors. It also does leave behind a bleach smell that isn’t horrible but people definitely notice it. Won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates odors, and doesn't have any perfume scent of its own!
customer_reviews.text: It eliminates foul smells around the house amazingly well. I just sprayed some in the cat box which was reeking of ammonia smelling cat pee to test it, and the smell disappeared. I like that it is unscented. Febreze will remove odors, but it masks them with all kinds of perfumes. I don't want my house to smell like perfume--I just want it to not smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work at all for me. I purchased it based on so many great reviews, but it did absolutely nothing for me; may as well have been water in a plant mister:( It's an expensive product - I expected it to work. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Mike

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog peed on my rug and I used this spray to get rid of the smell. After 3 times spraying it the smell is gone
customer_reviews.author: Monica J. Dudas

customer_reviews.title: It's not a gimmick, it really does get rid of ALL those pet odors.
customer_reviews.text: It's an easy spray, it doesn't leave too strong of an after scent, and when my dog was on "steroids" for her asthma, the medication caused her to pee a LOT more, and she did pee on the rug, but I wouldn't have known that because Odor Mute too care of that truly horrible urine smell.
customer_reviews.author: kenholidaypie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else does what this does
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat this stuff. I’ve used it to deodorize a friends car that had been smoked in for years. Recently just used it to get rid of puppy pee smell from carpets (used baking soda first but still had some scent lingering before I used this). Why this isn’t in stores everywhere I don’t know, it’s a miracle product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Zero Odor - Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to replace an (older) Zero Odor spray that we were very pleased with - did not have a scent. The newer product definitely has a scent. A family member has Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS) and we had to take the sprayed item outside to let it air out. Not sure we'll purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: DavidE

customer_reviews.title: It's at least less stinky....
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed on soft surfaces with an overpowering odor and it cleared it for a short time, but it still came back (although slightly less overpowering after use).
customer_reviews.author: JSchwartz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT odor eliminator, however I will say that wherever you spray it, it’ll noticeably feel wet on the floor/carpet. Of course it dries with time, but it’s not like a misting type of spray bottle it’s more like it sprays droplets. Works though!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBird

customer_reviews.title: Works great on pet odors
customer_reviews.text: It really works. I spray it every time after cleaning the litter box and pet smells are absolutely absent in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Zero Odor had no effect on the odor apparently coming from the carpet in a small bedroom. The odor seemed to originate from a dead rodent that had died somewhere inside the storage drawers in the room. I tried spraying inside the storage drawer compartment and on the carpet (twice) and on the curtains in the room, but the odor remained. I gave it two stars because it apparently works well in many situations.
customer_reviews.author: Chavans

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's name - Zero Odor
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years because it shuts down odors completely. I use it in the pet area (think cat boxes) to eliminate unpleasant and lingering odors. The odor is not covered up by sa scent as the Aero Odor is scentless.
customer_reviews.author: spg

customer_reviews.title: Effective in Odor Elimination
customer_reviews.text: I have used Zero Odor for a many years. I like the effectiveness of the product to eliminate odors without a strong scent. The nozzle emits a nice airy spray that doesn't drip out of the air.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Henderson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff WORKS. I bought it years ago after one of my cats died, he'd peed all over the house and it was enough to knock me down when I'd come back from outside. NOTHING helped, not liquid detergent, baking soda, rug shampoo, not even gallons of vinegar.....but this DID. I just bought it again to use in the litter box and around stinky garbage. A most excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!!! Helps get out all kinds of odors from blankets, clothing, garments, and stuffed animals and fabrics of all kinds. Leaves no evidence of discoloration or weird marks from everything I have used it on so far! Gets out cigar, cigarette smells from clothing and cloth or fabric items.
customer_reviews.author: Superpopcorngirl

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used couch that stunk of cigar smoke. This stuff truly got rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: theresa m bryner

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. This is a continual purchase item as I have one cat that seems bent on urinating anywhere but the litter box
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has severe asthma,i bought a car with a strong inscent smell in it that i tried to get out for 3 months spent over $150 ...This stuff works!! I did need two bottles but my baby could actually ride in the car, for the first time in 3 months.P.s. i have severe asthma and allergies too.The day i bought the car i was sick and could not smell the car.But the smell in it was so strong with the windows down for months you could walk past the car and smell it.I love this stuff.Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Porsha

customer_reviews.title: It's decent but not as good as the hype
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to get rid of smoke smells and although it works okay for other odor, it does not get rid of smoke smell in the air. Another person reviewed it and said that it got rid of "cat piss" smell but I find that extremely hard to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimsley

customer_reviews.title: Smoke smell in wood - Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a dresser that had a smoker smell. I had cleaned it in and out as best as I could, but the smell was still lingering. I used the Zero Odor and the smell was gone. It's been a while since I used it, but I think I let it sit for a couple of days before putting clothes in the drawers. I'm very pleased with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: PJerryOKC

customer_reviews.title: Removed most of the smoke smell from furniture
customer_reviews.text: This did an excellent job on removing most of the smoke smell from furniture that I purchased from someone who had smoked. I had tried many other products for removing smoke smells d this by far did the trick! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Modeen McRay

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It may be odorless but there is something about it that he LOVES!!! I sprayed it in the bathroom this morning and came home to find him rubbing himself all over the rug where the spray fell...maybe it has catnip as an odor reducer?! It works really well to eliminate odors...and attract goofball cats!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Spray in the air doen't really work
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it is water base or the spray does not work or it has not been designed to spray in the air. If I spray in the air, it is like water sprashing and dropping on the floor or counter.. it is not like the mist... it can only be used for cleaning the surface. So it doesn't work to eliminate cooking smell after cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Yutthachayan, Dalin

customer_reviews.title: Weed smell gone in seconds. Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.text: I used it as soon as it arrived because someone came into the house smelling like weed, which I find repulsive. I few sprays in the air in the area they walked and the weed smell was gone. There was a slight lingering smell for a few seconds, then it was gone. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Diane

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My female cat decided to urinate on the sofa and ottoman (protesting the move to a new house). I used the Zero Odor Multi-Purpose Household Odor Eliminator Spray and it worked like a charm. I really saturated the area twice, letting it dry between applications. I initially tried other products and they didn't put a dent in the smell.
customer_reviews.author: pinkchickn

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The used car I bought belonged to a heavy smoker, so although it didn't completely eliminate the smell it still made a big difference. I didn't have high expectations anyway because that cigarette smell I think is not easy to eliminate for any product, but I will continue to use it and hopefully it'll work even better through time.
customer_reviews.author: KIMURAxCHOKE

customer_reviews.title: Works, but has a bleach-like odor.
customer_reviews.text: The product does eliminate odors effectively. We have 3 dogs and it works on their beds and our couch. There is a bleach-like scent when you spray it that does fade with time. Despite the scent I haven’t noticed any damage to fabrics. Will likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ATX

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but effective. It actually neutralizes most odors. Of course, if you just whipped up a bacon-onion-and-sardine stir-fry, or something like that, do not expect miracles: You'll have to sell your house and move. Other than that, it does make a difference without a perfumey cover-up.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Killed the curry smell in a mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used mattress that looked brand spanking new, but got it home and realized it reeked of Curry. I tried steam cleaning it, various carpet cleaning powders, and even baking soda. I decided to give this a try and OMG it actually worked!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany E. Kosa

customer_reviews.title: Worked pretty well to cover up the pungent odor of sour ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well to cover up the pungent odor of sour milk in my new crate and barrel sectional. I had done everything in my power to wash and clean and treat the smell myself but nothing worked. This took about 4 spray outs but thankfully my house doesn't smell like garbage or dirty diapers as soon as you Walk in anymore. Get it. It works.
customer_reviews.author: P.M

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My cat peed all over an oak bench because of a "strange" coat left on it and it seeped inside too ---- I tried everything and this is the ONLY thing that worked! I HIGHLY recommend this to get rid of odors! My cat has not tried to re-mark this either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I cook complex Indian/Pakistani food with multiple spices that are very aromatic and long lasting. I ordered it after reading several reviews. Excellent product, very effective in eliminating strong spices and pungent odors. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: scpmghemonc

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This has a HORRIBLE smell and after 3 applications, I can still smell smoke in the couch. Very disappointed it cost a whole lot for how bad it worked. It did kill the smell a little but still noticeable and it this sprays sent is horrid.
customer_reviews.author: Laugh4apurpose

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on couch upholstery.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to deodorize a couch with a strong floral scent to it. I ended up buying a second bottle because I thought maybe the first had worked a little bit, but after applying the second bottle and letting it sit over a week the floral scent only got STRONGER. It overwhelmed my living space (where before it was confined to the room it was in), so the couch has been removed to the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie West

customer_reviews.title: effectively eliminates everyday household smells
customer_reviews.text: i haven't tried this to combat truly vile odors, but since buying it we routinely use it to eliminate everyday household smells. it sprays with a fine mist, has absolutely no fragrance so it doesn't add a smell or try to mask the existing odor, and actually seems to effectively eliminate odors. after using it for several months, i'm ordering a second bottle to keep in another room.
customer_reviews.author: greens

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my wife's 7 year old minivan, which she doesn't keep clean and which had built up a bad odor. I did clean out and shampoo the interior first, but some odor remained and this product took it away with one application, leaving a fresh, "sanitized" scent.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fonken

customer_reviews.title: Two of my cats rolled in it and started lapping it up when my back was turned.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but 2 of my cats went straight over to it, rolled in it and started lapping it up. I had to immediately give them a bath each and hope to god that they haven't poisoned themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barber

customer_reviews.title: Saved my luggage woes
customer_reviews.text: A cat peed on my luggage and the smell stayed on no matter what I did, tried everything I could possibly do, until I saw these. I ordered it and it saved my luggage! I only sprayed my entire luggage once and it worked. Now my luggage doesn’t smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new chair and the fabric had a strong odor. The spray didn’t come close to eliminating it!
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. It takes away the bad smells and is nearly odorless itself. I dislike sprays that leave strong odors of fake lemons, flowers, peaches, etc. I feel like I'm replacing one bad smell with another, and usually those types of sprays irritate my eyes and make me cough. Not so with Zero Odor. The smells are gone, period, and the air feels clean. It's more expensive than other sprays but it's worth the extra $.
customer_reviews.author: swansong8

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting rid of adult diaper odors. Pleasant industrial-type scent that’s not cloying or gross like Febreze. And the sprayer part actually keeps working till the product is gone. This is a great product - two thumbs way up.
customer_reviews.author: Denise54

customer_reviews.title: It works if used properly.
customer_reviews.text: I got one with a defective sprayer. I contacted Zero Odor and they admitted they had an issue with them and replaced mine quickly. Honest people. If you use just a little you won't experience the tracer smell that smells like bleach, but isn't. Don't soak your items. I've used this for multiple smelly things already and it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeezy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It really works! We smoke (outside) and use this to rid of the smoke smell on our clothes and fabrics outside. And in the car. It's great! It doesn't have a scent really, just like a nice clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: FrankieJohnny

product_meta.title: Zero Odor Multi-Purpose Household Odor Eliminator, Trigger Spray,
feature_bullets: Permanently Eliminate Odors in Kitchen, Bathroom, Nursery, Basement and more. Smoke, Even Skunk Odor
Zero Odor Doesn’t Mask or Cover Up Odors with Fragrances or Perfumes
It Permanently Eliminates All Existing Odor. And Freshens to Prevent Odor Build up
Spray in the air and on surfaces in any room. Leaves No Scent Behind
Made in the USA. It’s Non-toxic, Non-allergenic and Biodegradable

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
